spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shepherd is a 5th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The shepherd has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Animal Companion
entries: The shepherd is accompanied by one of the following creatures: a {@creature black bear|MM}, an {@creature elk|MM}, a {@creature panther|MM}, or a {@creature wolf|MM}.

trait.name: Language of the Land
entries: The shepherd is able to converse with beasts. Most beasts lack sufficient intelligence to convey or understand complicated concepts, but could converse in simple terms and are willing to help the shepherd with simple tasks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage.

action.name: Summon Fey (1/Day)
entries: The shepherd summons a {@creature dryad|MM} (25%), {@creature pixie|MM} (25%), or {@creature satyr|MM} (50%) that arrives at the start of the shepherd's next turn and remains for 1 minute.

trait.name: Swift Strike
entries: If the fighter makes a dash action in a direct line toward a creature, it may make a single melee attack against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fighter makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trickster is a 3rd level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The trickster has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The arcane trickster can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/turn)
entries: The trickster deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the trickster that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the trickster doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage at range, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bastion hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Shelter
entries: Allies within 5 feet of the bastion gain a +2 bonus to their AC, if the bastion is not {@condition prone} or {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Shield Charge
entries: If the bastion moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its flail on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bastion makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage in melee, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage at range.

reaction.name: Block
entries: The bastion adds +3 AC against an attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the bastion must see the attacker and be wielding a shield.

trait.name: Still Standing
entries: If the brawler has 10 or fewer hit points remaining, it has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brawler makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage in melee, or 11 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Goading Attack {@recharge 5}
entries: The defender makes an attack which, if it hits, imposes disadvantage on the target if it attacks any creature but the defender. The defender's attack also deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) extra damage with the attack.

reaction.name: Block
entries: The defender adds +2 AC against an attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the defender must see the attacker and be wielding a shield.

trait.name: Suave Defense
entries: When the duelist is wearing light armor or no armor and is not wielding a shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The duelist makes two rapier attacks.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The duelist adds +2 AC against an attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the duelist must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
